name: jsonm
description: json compressor for packing messages with memoization

scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify -s packer build/babel/packer.js -o build/packer.js && browserify -s unpacker build/babel/unpacker.js -o build/unpacker.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -s jsonm build/babel/index.js -o build/jsonm.js

author: Lennart Kats <lennart add c9.io>
